text: 2009 FIFA U-17 World Cup was held in Nigeria from 24 October to 15 November. == Teams == The final draw for the group stage was held on 7 August 2009 at the International Conference Centre in Abuja.Draw looms for 24Nigeria face Germany in opener Confederation Qualifying tournament Qualifier(s) AFC (Asia) 2008 AFC U-16 Championship CAF (Africa) Host nation CAF (Africa) 2009 African Under-17
